name: The Sims 4 Binary Household Data
summary: Learn about .HOUSEHOLDBINARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Each Sims 4 household is comprised of a:
SGI file for each sim included in the household (a household of three sims uses three SGI files)
These files can be found in the game's Tray directory, which is located in the following places in Windows and macOS:
Windows XP - C:/​Documents and Settings/​[username]/​My Documents/​Electronic Arts/​The Sims 4/​

Most players will never need to do anything with The Sims 4's HOUSEHOLDBINARY files. However, modders and players who are transferring a household from one instance of The Sims 4 to another may want to copy and/or move a household's files.

description: A HOUSEHOLDBINARY file is a game data file used by The Sims 4. It is one of a set of four or more files that comprise a Sims 4 household. HOUSEHOLDBINARY files are found in The Sims 4's Tray directory.

instructions: HOUSEHOLDBINARY files are not meant to be opened. To use a HOUSEHOLDBINARY file with The Sims 4, place it in the game's Tray folder along with the file's accompanying .HHI, TRAYITEM, and SGI files. The content your files contain will then appear in-game.
